description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Change your voice in real-time using your headset microphone. Choose from a variety of effects including, a pitch shifter, echo and a robot. Record and playback sounds for your friends.
